transcription: If you've been searching for just the right new home, don't miss what Terra Vista has to offer. We have spacious one and two bedroom apartments perfectly situated in San Antonio, just off Highway 151 and minutes from Lackland Air Force Base. A variety of shopping, dining and entertainment for all ages surrounds our community. At Terra Vista, you'll have plenty of relaxing options for recreation right outside your front door. We try to make life more convenient for our residents  so you'll have access to our business center, laundry facility and exercise center. Our gated community also features an outdoor picnic area and swimming pool with cabana. Thanks to our peaceful wooded setting, it's also a great place to enjoy walks with your pet as you take in the panoramic nature views. Our great selection of one and two bedroom apartments feature nine foot ceilings with crown molding and ceiling fans in all bedrooms. Maximum comfort is achieved with an oversized patio or balcony.  as well as a spacious living room. Full-size washer and dryer connections are included for laundry and each kitchen comes appointed with a refrigerator with ice maker, dishwasher, microwave and more. Call our helpful staff to learn more about the good life at Terra Vista and be sure to ask about our military and senior discounts.
